# hcswif command for generating all xem scaler files
./hcswif.py --mode replay --spectrometer SHMS_SCALER --run 2484-2498 2502-2505 2507-2508 2509-2523 2524-2538 2540-2545 2547-2563 --name xem-scaler --project c-comm2017 --cpu 1
swif import -file /lustre/expphy/volatile/hallc/xem2/pooser/hcswif/output/xem-scaler.json
swif run xem-scaler

# hcswif command for generating all xem files
./hcswif.py --mode replay --spectrometer SHMS --run 2484-2498 2502-2505 2507-2508 2509-2523 2524-2538 2540-2545 2547-2563 --name xem-all --project c-comm2017 --cpu 1
swif import -file /lustre/expphy/volatile/hallc/xem2/pooser/hcswif/output/xem-all.json
swif run xem-all

# hcswif run list
2484-2498 2502-2505 2507-2508 2509-2523 2524-2538 2540-2545 2547-2563
